name: ext_R5_Dosage_doseAndRate
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Dosage.doseAndRate for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents Dosage.doseAndRate from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Dosage|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R3.

element.short: Amount of medication administered, to be administered or typical amount to be administered
element.definition: Depending on the resource,this is the amount of medication administered, to  be administered or typical amount to be administered.
element.comment: `Dosage.doseAndRate` has no related element in R3:Dosage

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.short: xml:id (or equivalent in JSON)
element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.short: Additional Content defined by implementations
element.definition: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. element.short: The kind of dose or rate specified
element.definition: The kind of dose or rate specified, for example, ordered or calculated.
